Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are buzzing about the upcoming National Cabinet meeting with the Federal Budget just around the corner. Housing and healthcare remain at the forefront of discussions with particular attention being paid to after-hours doctor clinics and emergency departments in regional areas. There's also been debate around a new test for apprentice tradies as well as the JobSeeker payment. With rental vacancy rates hitting an all-time low could we see a much-needed increase in JobSeeker payments? The pressure is mounting on the government to deliver let's hope they take notice!
